title: Select All Users
markdown:
#  **Select All Users**

## Write a SQL query to select all columns from the ***users*** table.
### Table Schema: users
```
| Column | Type    | Description |
|--------|---------|-------------|
| id     | INTEGER | Primary Key |
| name   | TEXT    | User Name   |
| age    | INTEGER | User Age    |
```





### Example 1
**Input:**
```
+----+-------+-----+
| id | name  | age |
+----+-------+-----+
| 1  | Alice | 30  |
| 2  | Bob   | 20  |
+----+-------+-----+
```

**Output:**
```
+----+-------+-----+
| id | name  | age |
+----+-------+-----+
| 1  | Alice | 30  |
| 2  | Bob   | 20  |
+----+-------+-----+
```

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, age INTEGER);
